We must join this great movement called French socialism! # FH2012 #Lille
I know that Pierre Mauroy hears us, that he is present at our side! #Lille # FH2012
I greet @MartineAubry, first secretary of the PS. Without the PS, there is no change today in France! #Lille # FH2012
There are not two left, there is only one left, who wants to win, who wants to gather the French! #Lille # FH2012
It is immediately that we must win! #Lille # FH2012
I expect nothing but victory and then the transformation of our country! #Lille # FH2012
It is urgent, it is in 5 days that we will decide our destiny! #Lille # FH2012
"Courage" I am told, but courage, I will have it to the end to bring you to victory! #Lille # FH2012
Sunday, France will meet his destiny. The challenge is to continue the long march of history! #Lille # FH2012
The peasant that I am is moved when I see my Peasants and Fishermen Comrades forming the Great Patriotic Patron! Pa'lante Compatriots!
The march of history: the struggle of those who live by their work and whose only heritage is called social security #Lille # FH2012
It's the fight of those who expect so much from the Republican promise for their children! #Lille # FH2012
This promise we must honor: our children must live better than us, it's called progress, humanity, it's the French Dream!
France is not yet rid of poverty, the misery of injustice. It's our fight! #Lille # FH2012
I respect the unions. To attack the unions is ultimately to attack the workers! #Lille # FH2012
Our fight is not exhausted! #Lille # FH2012
So many generations have mobilized for great causes. Our goal is to enable progress, equality and justice!
I do not want a France without a factory, or factories without workers! #Lille # FH2012

We arrive, we will be there and we will give industrial prospects to France! #Lille # FH2012
We can not imagine a different policy with the same President! #Lille # FH2012
To change logic is to put an end to state aid to companies without any counterpart. #Lille # FH2012
To change logic is to end with unemployment that strikes the youngest and condemns the oldest! #Lille # FH2012
That's why I will make the generation contract! http://t.co/doCx8a0O #Lille # FH2012
To change logic is to end a system where money is used for speculation and not for production! #Lille # FH2012
To change the logic is to engage a large industrial policy for our large sectors in the medium and long term. #Lille # FH2012
To change logic is to invest in green growth and renewable energies! #Lille # FH2012
To change logic is to invest in education, in knowledge, in research, in knowledge! #Lille # FH2012
I am European. All my political commitments have been guided by the desire to build a Europe of solidarity and progress. #Lille
Today I am proud to bring together those who split yesterday: the "yes and the no"! #Europe #Lille # FH2012
An election campaign is useful: it allows the incumbent to know what he did not do! #Lille # FH2012
Why would not Europe make youth a great cause for the years to come, too ?! #Lille # FH2012
This is what my peasant and fisherman comrades are talking about. That is: the bourgeoisie will not be wrong again with us! Pa, lanteVenezuela!
I call you to this change for work, for employment, for human dignity, for the recovery of France, for Europe!
We have 5 days left! #Lille # FH2012
There will be no effort if it is not shared. #Lille # FH2012
I want a big tax reform that imposes the same rules on capital income and labor income! #Lille # FH2012

I arrive at Montataire to meet the unions of the company Still whose jobs are threatened. http://t.co/4DtRKhGj
I am here at #Montataire in the Oise to support the employees of Still, a manufacturer of lifting equipment. # FH2012
I remember my meeting with you, employees of Still, last September, as if it were yesterday. #Homeholder # FH2012
In Creil, ten days ago, I met again a delegation of employees of Still. #Homeholder # FH2012
I am coming to engage in this dialogue with the unions in Still and say what we can do. #Homeholder # FH2012
There was an "LBO", an operation that captures the substance of a business and then sell its business. #Homeholder # FH2012
The legislator will have to return to this LBO procedure (leveraged buy-out). #Industry #Housing # FH2012
I invite you to watch my participation in an interview with Carlos Loret de Mola at the "Canal de las Estrellas de Televisa".
I want a reindustrialization plan. We will make sure that Still's record is a priority. #Hunter # FH2012
It is up to the legislator to further strengthen the sanctions against entrepreneurs who behave badly! #Hunter # FH2012
I wish the government a productive pole. #Homeholder # FH2012
This ministry could intervene, use the public investment bank! #Homeholder # FH2012

What we are going to do on Sunday is a choice for France and a choice for the industry. #Homeholder # FH2012
